attributes.action: TO REMOVE MIKE ASHLEY AS NEWCASTLE OWNER/FORCED TO SELL THE CLUB!
attributes.additional_details: This is a petition which is hoping to get the full support of the footballing and indeed the sporting world to get Mike Ashley removed as Newcastle owner and being forced to sell the club. I hope myself that the government look at this petetion and indeed the multiple groups out there against Mike Ashley. @UtdForNewcastle on Twitter and United For Newcastle on Facebook is a group which is trying to get the fans more involved with NUFC and the board out and changed.
